canvas_summaries.ocr_text: vertolli National Union of Women Teachers 41 CROMWELL ROAD, SOUTH KENSINGTON, LONDON, S. W. 7. Six Reasons why Men and Women Teachers should receive EQUAL PAY 1. The length of training for men and women is EQUAL 2. Their hours of work are EQUAL. 3. Their grant- earning capacity is EQUAL. 4. Regulations governing the size of the classes they teach are EQUAL. 5. The cost of living is EQUAL. 6. The charge for railway, car, theatre and all other tickets is EQUAL. Thus, the price of goods which men and women buy is EQUAL But, the payment for labour which men and women sell is UNEQUAL. Do you believe that women teachers doing EQUAL WORK should receive only four- fifths of the men' s rate? IF NOT, JOIN THE N. U. W. T. which is working to establish the principle of equal pay for men and women teachers of the same professional status.
